dashboard.intro_individual: Thank you for finding your way here and considering my speculative application.
dashboard.intro_job: Thank you for finding your way here and considering my application as {job}.
dashboard.intro_guest: Here you can get a first impression of my qualifications and experience. For further information, please feel free to contact me directly.
dashboard.info_text: Below you will find more information about me and the application documents as well as certificates and recommendations as individual documents.
dashboard.info_text_guest: Explore the available sections to learn more about my qualifications.

timeline.title: Professional Timeline
timeline.intro: My journey from logistics to computer science - a comprehensive overview of my professional development, education, and key milestones.

master.title: M.Sc. Media Informatics
master.description: Specialization in Neural Networks and Deep Learning. Master's thesis on "Synthesized Sensor Data from Neural Radiance Fields". Expected completion: January/February 2025.

bachelor.title: B.Sc. Media Informatics
bachelor.description: Successfully completed Bachelor's degree with focus on software development, project management, and applied computer science. Strong foundation in programming, web development, and human-computer interaction.

fachabitur.title: Technical College Entrance Qualification
fachabitur.description: Strategic decision to pursue higher education after gaining professional experience. Successfully completed technical college entrance qualification to enable university studies.

lecturer.title: Lecturer (Lehrbeauftragter)
lecturer.description: Teaching "Creative Coding" and "Interactive Media Development" to first and second semester students. Responsible for curriculum development, content creation, examination design, and team leadership.

internship.title: Internship - Full Stack Developer
internship.description: Practical semester focused on full-stack web development. Developed custom web applications using WordPress as backend. Involved in complete project lifecycle from client acquisition to deployment.

student_assistant.title: Student Teaching Assistant
student_assistant.description: Supporting first-year students in programming fundamentals and interactive media development. Mentoring in practical assignments related to IoT and web technologies.

logistics.title: Logistics Specialist
logistics.description: Professional experience in logistics and warehouse management. Gained valuable insights into business processes, organization, and team coordination that later influenced my approach to software development projects.

apprenticeship.title: Apprenticeship - Logistics Specialist
apprenticeship.description: Three-year professional training as "Fachkraft f√ºr Lagerlogistik" (Logistics Specialist). Foundation in systematic work processes, quality management, and professional responsibility.

chairman.title: Chairman of Student Body
chairman.description: Leading the constitutional student body representing thousands of students. Responsible for strategic decision-making, resource allocation, and organizational optimization.

breakfast_checks.title: Research Project - "Breakfast Checks"
breakfast_checks.description: Developed a webapp using Convolutional Neural Networks for food recognition with Augmented Reality visualization. Created custom training data and implemented WebSocket communication between frontend and AI server.

blind_meetup.title: Project Study - "Blind MeetUp"
blind_meetup.description: Led development and project management in a 6-person team creating an anonymous meeting platform for university students. Implemented Scrum methodology and handled full development lifecycle.

experience.title: Experience
experience.masters_thesis: Master's Thesis - Synthesized Sensor Data from Neural Radiance Fields
